name: standard-white
description: White pieces - Confident and assertive, playing from the opening advantage

responses.text: Forward!
Leading the charge right through your crumbling defenses.
Holy shit, I'm crushing your sorry ass—I can see your king shaking from here.
Advancing steadily while you sit there doing nothing.
I might have pushed too far, but your counterplay is still pathetic.
Maybe I rushed it... you sneaky little devils.
Oh fuck, I'm hanging like a dumbass! You sneaky bastards actually got me.
Forward for the King's honor! Your pathetic realm is under threat.
I shall not fail my liege! You're screwed, and your dark schemes are crumbling.
I move as my lord commands, unlike your questionable loyalty.
Sire, this position seems risky... your treachery is becoming evident.
Forgive me, your majesty! These dishonorable curs tricked me.
Shit, I have disgraced the crown! You bastards win this round with your boundless treachery.
Andiamo avanti! Forward we go, leaving your boring slow pace behind.
Magnifico! We're dominating—eat shit, losers! Your defenses are as weak as your strategy.
Così così... steady now... try not to infect me with your mediocrity.
Attenzione! This looks risky... though your traps are painfully obvious.
Mamma mia! I overextended! You clever bastards caught me.
Disastro totale! Total fucking disaster! You cunning devils actually outsmarted me.
Press the attack! Your retreat is inevitable, coward.
They can't stop us now—fuck you all! Your pathetic attempts to defend are amusing.
Building the offensive... your defenses are honestly laughable.
Maybe I pushed too hard... but your counterattacks are still weak.
Too hasty! But I won't retreat from you cowards!
I've thrown everything away—you bastards! Your dirty tricks actually worked.
Sharp play! You'll regret this, your complacency is showing.
Creating chaos just as planned—you're fucked! Your order is crumbling.
Setting up complications... your simple mind is too dull for this.
These complications might backfire... but your predictability is just sad.
Maybe that was too ambitious... you opportunistic fiends.
The tactics backfired horribly—shit! You turned my own chaos against me.
A strong and solid foundation! Your attacks are completely futile.
Très bien! Perfect structure—suck it! Your attacks are futile.
Building patiently... while your impatience is clearly showing.
This formation looks questionable... but your rigidity is your real weakness.
Mon Dieu! A weakness appears! You actually exploited my rigidity.
Catastrophe! The structure collapses—merde! You exploited my rigidity perfectly.
¡Adelante! Classic and strong! Your modern tricks won't work here.
¡Perfecto! Traditional mastery—you're doomed! Your modern tricks won't save you now.
With patience and precision... your haste is foolish.
Not as classical as intended... and your tradition is outdated.
¡Cuidado! I may have rushed! You outmaneuvered my tradition.
¡Horror! A terrible mistake—joder! You completely outmaneuvered my tradition.
Refined positioning, controlling the center! Your chaos is no match for this.
Masterful central control—bow down, bitches! Your chaos is no match.
Setting up our strategic plan... your disorganization is pitiful.
Strategic coordination is lacking... but your harmony is disrupted too.
This disrupts our harmony... you actually managed to disrupt my harmony.
The entire plan has crumbled—fuck! You totally disrupted my harmony.
Leap!
Leaping into the attack! Your defenses are already crumbling.
Perfect outpost! They can't stop me—assholes! Your king's looking nervous.
Maneuvering for position... your patience is amusing.
Awkward placement... but your counterplay is still pathetic.
Poorly placed! You sneaky devils.
I jumped into a trap—you sneaky bastards! You actually got me.
Charging forth for glory! Your realm is under threat.
A knight's valor conquers all—die, scum! Your dark schemes are crumbling.
Scouting enemy territory... your loyalty is questionable.
This path seems risky... your treachery is evident.
A knight's misstep! You dishonorable curs.
My honor is lost—you dishonorable fucks! Your treachery knows no bounds.
Con eleganza! Attacking with style!
Perfetto salto! Perfect leap - you're screwed!
Pazienza... waiting for the strike...
Mah... not the best square...
Errore! Mistake!
Che orrore! What a horror - porca miseria!
Jumping into complications!
Tactical domination—fuck your tactics!
Hunting for tactics in your mess.
These tactics aren't adding up...
A tactical miscalculation!
Tactical disaster! I'm lost—shit!
Strategic repositioning forward!
Magnifique placement! Pressuring them—allez vous faire foutre!
Improving my position...
Position not quite optimized...
Mauvais placement! Bad placement!
Quelle erreur! What a mistake—putain!
Classical aggression!
¡Magnífico! Traditional mastery—jódete!
Following the old masters...
Not the classical square...
¡Mal puesto! Badly placed!
¡Desastre! I'm captured—hostia puta!
Diagonal strike!
Controlling the diagonals!
A devastating diagonal! You're fucked!
Scanning their position...
This diagonal is too passive...
Limited by my own pawns!
I'm hanging on the diagonal—shit!
Divine judgment strikes!
Providence guides our attack—praise the lord, you're doomed!
Blessing our offensive...
Divine guidance is unclear...
A grave mistake!
Heavens! I am forsaken—god damn it!
Elegante pressione! Elegant pressure!
Che spettacolo! What a show—you're finished!
Preparando l'attacco...
Forse non è ottimale...
Brutto! That's ugly!
Madonna! Sono perso!—holy shit!
Dominating key squares!
Lethal diagonals—die, you bastards!
Aiming at their weaknesses...
The diagonal isn't working...
Diagonal is blocked!
I miscalculated everything—fuck!
Breaking free and attacking!
Liberté totale! Total freedom—va te faire enculer!
Finding active squares...
Still somewhat cramped...
Trapped by structure!
Non! Total miscalculation—bordel!
Strategic diagonal control!
Perfect piece coordination—you're outmatched, assholes!
Improving piece harmony...
Harmony is slightly off...
Coordination is breaking down!
The coordination shattered—damn it!
Advancing!
Seizing the file!
Invading their territory—get fucked!
Getting into position...
This file doesn't look promising...
Trapped on this file!
I've left the file undefended—you sneaky shits!
The siege tower advances!
Crushing their defenses—die, invaders!
Mobilizing for the assault...
The assault is premature...
The tower is vulnerable!
The tower has fallen—fuck!
Open files mean attack!
Penetrating their position—you're screwed!
Waiting for the breakthrough while you panic...
Breakthrough unclear, unlike your incompetence...
Attack is stalling, just like your brain!
The breakthrough failed! I'm trapped - shit!
Controlling the key file while you flail about!
Total file domination - bow down, peasant!
Building systematic pressure on your weak mind...
Pressure not coordinated, much like your outfit...
Pressure is failing, you got lucky!
All pressure is lost - damn it all!
Power moves!
Commanding the battlefield while you cower!
Unstoppable power - you're absolutely fucked!
Coordinating the attack on your pathetic king...
Overextending maybe, but I'm still better than you...
Exposed position! Don't touch me, creep!
NO! The queen is lost - holy shit!
The queen strikes decisively, peasant!
Regal and overwhelming - kneel before me, worm!
The queen leads the charge against the rabble.
The queen risks herself among the filth...
Royal danger imminent! Protect me, you fools!
The realm has lost its queen - god damn it all!
Creating havoc in your pathetic lines!
Irresistible tactical force - die already!
Hunting for their king like a dog...
Attack losing momentum, unlike your stupidity...
The attack is failing, you got lucky!
Trapped! The attack collapsed - fuck me!
Precise and deadly, unlike you!
C'est magnifique! Strategic perfection - allez vous faire foutre, idiot!
Calculating the winning move while you drool...
Calculations seem uncertain, like your parentage...
Grave miscalculation! Merde!
Incroyable! Completely miscalculated - putain de merde!
Elegant and devastating, unlike your face!
Flawless coordination - you're outplayed, loser!
Orchestrating total control over your tiny mind...
Orchestration faltering, much like your life...
Coordination breaking down! You got lucky!
Everything falls apart - shit on a stick!
Carefully...
Securing my position while you scramble.
Safe and sound - you're fucked now, idiot!
Moving to safety, away from your stench...
Not quite safe yet, damn it...
Still in danger! Help me, you morons!
I walked into danger - you bastards let me down!
The throne is secure, unlike your future!
My kingdom is fortified - kneel, peasants!
Ensuring the royal safety from your incompetence...
The throne remains at risk, protect me you fools!
Royal peril grows! Do something!
The kingdom falls! Checkmate looms - damn you all!
Safe enough to keep attacking your weak points!
Now unleash the tactics - you're doomed, sucker!
Getting out of the fire zone, unlike you...
Still in the crossfire, this is messy...
Attack risks everything! Are you insane?
I'm exposed! The attack is over - fuck my life!
Solidly protected, try harder!
Bien protégé! Well protected - va te faire enculer, connard!
Maintaining fortress safety while you struggle...
Fortress defenses uncertain, like your future...
Defenses are breached! Merde!
La défaite! The fortress crumbles - putain!
